title: ALARM - Is this ever gunna get a fix (Pixel4 XL)
content:
After the latest Security Update (a few days ago for me) I woke up today several hours after I should have ...
Usually I get the typical "missed alarm" notification at the top, today NOTHING.!

Head to Alarm Settings and all 3 of the alarms that I had set are gone, completely gone. As well as my Bedtime Routine and the Assistant setup. 

I have perform EVERY suggested workaround and nothing fixes the issue. I had to buy an alarm clock you plug in because well I'm gunna get fired. 

And I don't see the point in having to download a different app when there is one built into my phone on purpose.
